column11:
>
Delve into the world of exquisite fashion with this stylish pair of sandals from Amore. The uppers feature leather straps which are adjustable. The midsole also made of leather that would sooth your feet all day long. Perfect for wearing at parties and other occasions these sandals are sure to add the finishing touch of sophistication to your style quotient.

Style Tip
Wear these sandals with salwar suit or saree for a sophisticated look.

Specifications
Colour: Black
Usage: Casual Formal
Heel Height: Low Heels

Care Tips
Gently brush away dust or dirt using a soft cleaning brush.
You can also use a dry soft sponge or hand towel to restore surface.
